data.title: Contact Us
data.meta_description: Need to get in touch with Lockheed Martin? Contact us today by phone or email. Find our phone number and support information here.
data.text:
Careers

If you have an inquiry about an application please email the Lockheed Martin Support Services. Due to the extremely high volume of email we receive, we cannot guarantee that all website inquiries will be answered. We will do our best to respond as staffing and resources permit.

Job Application Accommodations

If you have a physical or mental disability and need a reasonable accommodation to find or apply for a Lockheed Martin job on our website, please access our Job Application Accommodations page for instructions.

Employment Verification

For employment and income verification on our employees:

Visit the Equifax Verification Services website: www.theworknumber.com

Call 1-800-367-5690

Lockheed Martinâ€™s Employer Code is 11102. Please note that a Salary Key is required for proof of employment plus income. Employees may get a Salary Key by visiting The Work Number website or calling 1-800-367-2884.

Become A Supplier

To find information on conducting business with Lockheed Martin, please visit the supplier information page or provide your marketing information here.

Media Usage

This form should be utilized to contact our team for permission to use Lockheed Martin photos, videos and other copyrighted media items. Please provide the name of your organization, email, phone number and a detailed description of your request. Responses can take up to five business days.

PLEASE NOTE: This is not a general inquiry form. Only requests for Media Usage permissions outlined above will receive a response.

Social Impact

For information on our Social Impact programs and funding priorities, please visit https://www.lockheedmartin.com/en-us/who-we-are/communities.html or submit the inquiry form below.

Financial Questions

Questions related to the financial statements of Lockheed Martin Corporation should be directed to Investor Relations. If you would like a copy of Lockheed Martin printed financial records please see our online request form.

Email Investor Relations
